mapper.update: /* 여행 계획 업데이트 */ UPDATE INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN SET RGN_SCTGRY_CD = #{planRegionSmallCate}, TRIP_PLN_BGNG_YMD = #{startDate}, TRIP_PLN_END_YMD = #{endDate}, TRIP_PLN_DAY = #{planDays}, TRIP_PLN_TTL = #{planTitle}, TRIP_PLN_NOPE = #{planAttend}, AVAILABLE_BUDGET = #{budgetPerAttend}, TOTAL_AVAIL_BUDGET = #{totalAvailBudget}, TOTAL_PLNNED_BUDGET = #{totalPlanBudget}, REMAINING_BUDGET = #{diffBudget}, IN_PRGRS = #{planStatus}, SHARED_YN = #{isShare}, MDFCN_MBR_ID = #{sessionId}, MDFCN_YMD = NOW() WHERE TRIP_PLN_NO=#{planId}
mapper.select: /* 전체 여행 계획 조회 */ SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.REG_YMD) AS planNum, TRIP_PLN_NO, MBR_ID, CONCAT_WS(' ', REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_LCTGRY_NM, REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_MCTGRY_NM) AS planAddr, TRIP_PLN_BGNG_YMD, TRIP_PLN_END_YMD, TRIP_PLN_DAY, TRIP_PLN_TTL, TRIP_PLN_NOPE, AVAILABLE_BUDGET, TOTAL_AVAIL_BUDGET, TOTAL_PLNNED_BUDGET, IN_PRGRS, SHARED_YN, INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.REG_YMD AS regDate, INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.MDFCN_YMD AS modDate FROM INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN INNER JOIN REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY ON INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.RGN_SCTGRY_CD = REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_SCTGRY_CD

/* 계획 id에 해당하는 여행 계획 조회 */ SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.REG_YMD) AS planNum, TRIP_PLN_NO, MBR_ID, CONCAT_WS(' ',REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_LCTGRY_NM, REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_MCTGRY_NM) AS planAddr, TRIP_PLN_BGNG_YMD, TRIP_PLN_END_YMD, TRIP_PLN_DAY, TRIP_PLN_TTL, TRIP_PLN_NOPE, AVAILABLE_BUDGET, TOTAL_AVAIL_BUDGET, TOTAL_PLNNED_BUDGET, REMAINING_BUDGET, IN_PRGRS, SHARED_YN, INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.REG_YMD, INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.MDFCN_YMD FROM INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN INNER JOIN REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY ON INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.RGN_SCTGRY_CD = REGION_SMALL_CATEGORY.RGN_SCTGRY_CD WHERE INDIVIDUAL_TRIP_PLAN.TRIP_PLN_NO = #{PlanId}
/* 전체 지역 코드 조회 */ SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY area_code) AS areaNum, area_code, area_name, REG_YMD AS areaRegDate, MDFCN_YMD AS areaModDate FROM AREA_CODE

/* 전체 시군 코드 조회 */ SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY AC.area_code, SC.sigungu_code) AS sigunNum, SC.sigungu_code, SC.sigungu_name, SC.area_id, AC.area_code, AC.area_name, SC.REG_YMD AS sigunRegDate, SC.MDFCN_YMD AS sigunModDate FROM SIGUNGU_CODE AS SC left join AREA_CODE AS AC on SC.area_id = AC.area_code

/* 지역 코드와 일치하는 시군 코드 조회 */ SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY AC.area_code, SC.sigungu_code) AS sigunNum, SC.sigungu_code, SC.sigungu_name, SC.area_id, AC.area_code, AC.area_name, SC.REG_YMD AS sigunRegDate, SC.MDFCN_YMD AS sigunModDate FROM SIGUNGU_CODE AS SC left join AREA_CODE AS AC on SC.area_id = AC.area_code WHERE SC.area_id = #{areaCode}
